items.content_html: A lightweight and efficient WhatsApp bot designed to streamline interactions. Powered by the XSTRO API for core functionality, with Axios ensuring fast performance. Requires only a stable server internet connection.
items.title: AstroX11/Xstro: A lightweight and efficient WhatsApp bot designed to streamline interactions. Powered by the XSTRO API for core functionality, with Axios ensuring fast performance. Requires only a stable server internet connection.

items.content_html: Cloud Calculator is a simple, lightweight RESTful API built with TypeScript and Express.js. It provides basic arithmetic operations including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. The API is designed for easy integration into other projects or as a standalone service for handling mathematical calculations.
items.title: AhmedElKhoriby/cloud-calculator: Cloud Calculator is a simple, lightweight RESTful API built with TypeScript and Express.js. It provides basic arithmetic operations including addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division. The API is designed for easy integration into other projects or as a standalone service for handling mathematical calculations.

items.title: davidxhk/pova: A lightweight, plugin-based validation framework for building interactive forms with real-time feedback.

items.content_html: Lightweight and open-source real-time PM2 instances manager with instances-based user management system.
items.title: milosz08/pm2-real-time-web-ui: Lightweight and open-source real-time PM2 instances manager with instances-based user management system.

items.content_html: Unbloat is a powerful tool designed to help developers manage and clean up their Git repositories by identifying and handling files that were once tracked but are no longer present in the latest commits. It's particularly useful for maintaining a lightweight repo without compromising commit history.
items.title: dvho/unbloat: Unbloat is a powerful tool designed to help developers manage and clean up their Git repositories by identifying and handling files that were once tracked but are no longer present in the latest commits. It's particularly useful for maintaining a lightweight repo without compromising commit history.

items.content_html: A lightweight Typescript library that interacts with Gotenberg's different modules to convert a variety of document formats to PDF files.
items.title: cherfia/chromiumly: A lightweight Typescript library that interacts with Gotenberg's different modules to convert a variety of document formats to PDF files.

items.content_html: A lightweight library that determines whether it's currently after sunrise or after sunset at a specified location, leveraging suncalc for accurate astronomical calculations

items.title: dvho/passomatic: Passomatic is a lightweight password generation module that takes one argument, a number from 1-10 as an indication of password strength.

items.content_html: Commatic is a lightweight comma delimiter for formatting numbers into standard form periods. Everyone needs one of these.

items.content_html: A lightweight and intuitive flashcard app designed for both iOS and Android devices. It offers a user-friendly interface for creating, managing, and studying flashcards. With features like deck management, flashcard operations, and study tools, this app is perfect for anyone looking to improve their learning experience.
items.title: WoodyLinwc/Flashcard-Expo-V2: A lightweight and intuitive flashcard app designed for both iOS and Android devices. It offers a user-friendly interface for creating, managing, and studying flashcards. With features like deck management, flashcard operations, and study tools, this app is perfect for anyone looking to improve their learning experience.
